skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: Front-end development involves creating the user interface and user experience of a website or web application. It focuses on the visual aspects that users interact with, such as layouts, buttons, forms, and overall design. Technologies that I use include HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, along with a front-end framework React

skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: Back-end development involves building the server-side and database components of a web application. It includes managing data, handling requests from the front end, and ensuring the overall functionality and security of the application. Languages I use for Back-end development are Node.js, Python, Java and C/C++

skills.title: Mobile Application
skills.description: Mobile application development involves creating software applications for mobile devices such as smartphones and tablets. It includes both iOS and Android development. I use to build apps for multiple platforms with a single codebase

skills.title: Exploratory Data Analysis
skills.description: EDA is a data analysis approach that focuses on summarizing, visualizing, and understanding the main characteristics of a dataset to uncover patterns, trends, and relationships in the data. I use programming languages Python and R

portfolio.title: Simple Calculator
portfolio.description: A simple Calculator with basic operations and numbers using Flutter

portfolio.title: Registration App
portfolio.description: A full registration app with Login,Register and Home pages

portfolio.title: Login Page
portfolio.description: It is a react website for a simple registration login page
